pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clinical Trial Designs in 'RStan' // A showcase of Bayesian clinical trial designs, implemented in 'RStan' and R, including the Continual Reassessment Method (CRM) and EffTox. Given the emphasis on flexibility in Bayesian analysis, the implementations in a common language and style may serve as a cookbook to encourage the use of Bayesian methods in trials. Compiled 'RStan' models are installed, alongside helper classes and functions to work with models. There is a preponderance of early phase trial designs because this is where Bayesian methods are used most. If there is a published Bayesian design you want implemented in 'Stan', get in touch.
